page.title: 04Sheepdog trial
page.content: On the{15th June}we had a sheepdog trial at{Maplehurst Farm}to raise money for our school.We had 44 entrants and their dogs. Most of the handlers ran 2 or more dogs. There were some{stalls like pottery and spining also some of the children from the school did {country dancing.}At lunchtime you could have roast lamb to eat.When you got on to the course you had 15 minutes to round the sheep up.Someone from the farm brought a{llama}round so that people could guess the name of it.If you won you had a cake.On the night some people had to sleep in a caravan to look after the food and drink and they had to light the fire. The{person who won}was called C.Winteron and his dog was called Dylan. We raised{Â£1OOO}that will go to the{school.
